title: PathFactory Session Fieldgroup Details - V1.1
description: This schema field is an integral part of the PathFactory platform's session tracking system, designed to capture and store detailed information about individual user sessions. A session represents a series of interactions a visitor has with the platform within a specific time frame. The PathFactory Session Schema Field records data such as session duration, the sequence of pages viewed, actions taken, and engagement levels. This information is crucial for understanding the context of user behavior, analyzing how visitors navigate through content, and identifying opportunities for enhancing the user experience. By leveraging this data, PathFactory can deliver more personalized content and improve overall session quality, contributing to more effective engagement strategies.

pathfactory:session.title: Pathfactory Session
pathfactory:session.description: Pathfactory Session Object is used to get all the information related to User Session which can be used to break out users into groups based on certain characteristics of their sessions spent using PathFactory product

xdm:sessionID.description: Defines a unique ID that a web server assigns to a user for the duration of the current session
xdm:sessionID.title: Session ID

xdm:modifiedUTC.description: Defines the Date in UTC format for a session modified in PathFactory platform
xdm:modifiedUTC.title: Modified UTC

xdm:averagePercentageScrolled.description: Defines the how much visitor has scrolled the page on avarage veritically
xdm:averagePercentageScrolled.title: Average Percentage Scrolled

xdm:averageViewTimePerAsset.description: Defines the how much time visitor has spent on average Per Asset
xdm:averageViewTimePerAsset.title: Average View Time Per Asset

xdm:captureModalShownCount.description: Defines the number of forms show in a Modal
xdm:captureModalShownCount.title: Capture Modal Shown Count

xdm:captures.description: Defines the total number of forms
xdm:captures.title: Captures

xdm:city.description: Defines the City of a visitor from where user is trying to access the page
xdm:city.title: City

xdm:clicks.description: Defines the Number of clicks by a visitor on the page of PathFactory platform
xdm:clicks.title: Clicks

xdm:country.description: Defines the Country of a visitor from where user is trying to access the page
xdm:country.title: Country

xdm:demandbaseAnnualSales.description: Defines visitor's company's Annual Business Sales fetched from 3rd party Demandbase tool if available
xdm:demandbaseAnnualSales.title: Demandbase Annual Sales

xdm:demandbaseCompanyName.description: Defines visitor's Comapany name fetched from 3rd party Demandbase tool if available

xdm:demandbaseEmployeeCount.description: Defines visitor's company's Employee Count fetched from 3rd party Demandbase tool if available
xdm:demandbaseEmployeeCount.title: Demandbase Employee Count

xdm:demandbaseIndustry.title: Demandbase Industry

xdm:demandbaseSID.description: Defines the unique Security IDentifier assigned to a company or a group in Demandbase tool
xdm:demandbaseSID.title: Demandbase SID

xdm:demandbaseWebSite.description: Defines visitor's Comapany Website fetched from 3rd party Demandbase tool if available
xdm:demandbaseWebSite.title: Demandbase Website

xdm:deviceType.description: Defines the Device used while visting the pages, i.e. Computer, mobile etc.
xdm:deviceType.title: Device Type

xdm:emailAddress.description: Defines the email address of a Visitor
xdm:emailAddress.title: Email Address

xdm:emailDomain.description: Defines the email domain of a Visitor

xdm:endTimeUTC.description: Defines the Time in UTC format, when user ended session on a Page in PathFactory platform
xdm:endTimeUTC.title: End Time (UTC)

xdm:endTime.description: Defines the Time in general format, when user ended session on a Page in PathFactory platform
xdm:endTime.title: End Time

xdm:engagementScore.description: Defines the total score of a visitor session
xdm:engagementScore.title: Engagement Score

xdm:engagementTime.description: Defines the total time spent on a current session
xdm:engagementTime.title: Engagement Time

xdm:experienceExternalID.description: Defines the Content Track Experience External ID in PathFactory platform
xdm:experienceExternalID.title: Experience External ID

xdm:experienceID.description: Defines the unique ID assigned to Content Track Experience in PathFactory platform
xdm:experienceID.title: Experience ID

xdm:experienceName.description: Defines the name given to Experience in PathFactory platform
xdm:experienceName.title: Experience Name

xdm:incrementalEngagementTime.description: Defines the additional time a user spends engaging with content beyond an initial baseline or expected level
xdm:incrementalEngagementTime.title: Incremental Engagement Time

xdm:ip.description: Defines the IP Address of the Visitor
xdm:ip.title: IP

xdm:ip2ProxyIsproxy.description: Defines if the request is coming from the proxy server using 3rd party tool called - IP2Location
xdm:ip2ProxyIsproxy.title: IP 2 Proxy Is Proxy

xdm:isp.description: Defines the Internet Service Provider's name of the Visitor
xdm:isp.title: ISP

xdm:likes.description: Defines number of likes page has received
xdm:likes.title: Likes

xdm:os.description: Defines the OS used while visiting the pages
xdm:os.title: OS

xdm:queryString.description: Defines the pre-defined custom query string appended at the end of the page URL, which are created on PathFactory platform
xdm:queryString.title: Query String

xdm:referrerURL.description: Defines the URL of a source which referred this page
xdm:referrerURL.title: Referrer URL

xdm:region.description: Defines the Region from where session is initiated
xdm:region.title: Region

xdm:referrerMedium.description: Defines how the user visited the first page in the session e.g. search, social, direct, email etc.
xdm:referrerMedium.title: Referrer Medium

xdm:referrerSource.description: Defines the source that referred this page to the user. e.g. Google, Yahoo, LinkedIn etc.
xdm:referrerSource.title: Referrer Source

xdm:referrerTerm.description: Defines the term that was searched by the user to find this page.
xdm:referrerTerm.title: Referrer Term

xdm:shares.description: Defines the total number of page shares
xdm:shares.title: Shares

xdm:startTimeUTC.description: Defines the Time in UTC format, when user started session on a Page in PathFactory platform
xdm:startTimeUTC.title: Start Time (UTC)

xdm:startTime.description: Defines the Time in general format, when user started session on a Page in PathFactory platform
xdm:startTime.title: Start Time

xdm:userAgent.description: User Agent request header is a characteristic string that lets servers and network peers identify the application.
xdm:userAgent.title: User Agent
